v.
CITY OF LAS VEGAS, a State of Nevada Municipal Corporation; and Westcare Foundation, Inc., a Nevada Corporation, Respondents. No. 74562 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED DECEMBER 11, 2018

AFFIRMED.
